comment:
Fail to se how this game gets such favourabel ratings!

If you are fortunate enough to have the 8 or the 7 value City cards dealt to you, you will probably do well. Other than that, you will be an "also ran".
Interesting choices whether to take the money (which you need to expand) or build up for victory points. Nothing too exciting, but a solid game.
Way too dated in appearance. Box art is one of the worst.

玩擴建/擴張起屋爭income / Area Majority 叮分既輕中策game, D人覺得佢似舊版power grid.

+簡單易教, 有舊game design 味道
+重玩性高
-開頭抽牌放位置實在太重要

總: 整體都係幾好玩. 值得一試, 亦願意玩多一次.

This is such a Euro among Euros, and I love everything about it. High complexity with a really low "wow" factor until you actually learn the ins and outs with a competitive group. This is an old-school style that was designed for challenging, "outwit and outplay" style strategic gaming. Very German, very understated but very fun. There's very few games like it!
One of my favorite games. I recall numerous games with my best board game friend many many years ago. I finally found a copy to purchase for myself recently!

2nd Edition
